articles.title: All U.S. embassy staff evacuated from war-torn Sudan, White House says - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. military evacuated American government personnel from Khartoum, President Joe Biden said on Saturday, adding that Washington is suspending operations at its embassy there as fighting between Sudan's rival commanders continued.
articles.content: KHARTOUM, April 22 (Reuters) - The U.S. military evacuated American government personnel from Khartoum, President Joe Biden said on Saturday, adding that Washington is suspending operations at its em… [+5780 chars]

articles.title: US Evacuates Personnel From Sudan's Capital Amid "Unconscionable" Fighting - NDTV
articles.description: The US military evacuated American embassy staff from Khartoum, President Joe Biden said late Saturday, calling for an end to the "unconscionable" fighting in Sudan's capital between the army and a paramilitary group.

articles.title: 44 percent of Republicans don’t want Trump to run for reelection: poll - The Hill
articles.description: A new poll found that 70 percent of Americans, including 44 percent of Republicans, do not want former President Trump to make a White House run in 2024. The poll, released Thursday from The Associated Press and the University of Chicago’s research center NOR…
